message:
The Radio App For Windows 8.1 & Windows Phone 8.1 : :)

1. No more jamming , Now it's just one click to listen to the best radio  
    stations.
2. Stream +100 radio station over the internet.
3. Enjoy listening to different radio stations categories such as (Arabic ,    
    Pop , Classical , Blues , Rock  , Pop , Electronic ).

Kindly Download it :)

For  Windows 8.1:
http://apps.microsoft.com/windows/en-us/app/the-radio/2ff67608-57ca-4b89-a941-fc4da1ebcb86

For Windows Phone 8.1 : 
https://www.windowsphone.com/en-us/store/app/the-radio/a7367827-0416-41b2-8e04-e15c7b8c6cce

#The_Radio
#Arabic #Radio 
#Music #Apps
#Windows
story: Mo'men Zakaria Zowayed shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: The Radio app for Windows in the Windows Store
caption: apps.microsoft.com
description: Learn more about The Radio by Mo'men Zakaria Zowayed and download it from the Windows Store
